name: Grass Is Meaner / Grass Is Greener
notes: Travel to the Rogue Isles as a Vigilante / Travel to Paragon City as a Rogue

name: Master of Lady Grey's Task Force
notes: Complete the Lady Grey Task Force with No Temporary Powers and Zero Team Defeats

name: Master of Ms. Liberty's Task Force
notes: Complete the Ms. Liberty Task Force with No Temporary Powers and Zero Team Defeats

name: Master of Lord Recluse's Strike Force
notes: Complete the Lord Recluse Strike Force with No Temporary Powers, and Zero Team Defeats

name: Master of the 5th Column Task Force
notes: Complete the Dr. Kahn Task Force with No Temporary Powers and Zero Team Defeats

name: Master of the Imperious Task Force
notes: Complete the Imperious Task Force with No Temporary Powers and Zero Team Defeats

name: Master of the 5th Column Strike Force
notes: Successfully complete the Barracuda Strike Force with challenge settings of zero defeats and no Temporary Powers.

name: Drone Protector
notes: Ensure no drones are defeated in the first mission of the Apex Task Force

name: Burden Bearer / Arm's Length
notes: Don't activate any drones in the first mission of the Apex Task Force

name: Already Dead
notes: Defeat Battle Maiden within 15 minutes in the Apex Task Force

name: Hacker
notes: Click all 8 devices within 30 seconds of entering the warehouse in the first mission of the Tin Mage Mark II Task Force

name: Midnight Dodger What Dodges at Midnight
notes: Set off zero proximity mines during the warehouse battle in the first mission of the Tin Mage Mark II Task Force

name: Kitty's Got Claws
notes: In the third mission of the Tin Mage Mark II Task Force, defeat Neuron before Bobcat reaches 50% health, then defeat Bobcat

name: Army of Neu
notes: Defeat 40 of Neuron's clones in the third mission of the Tin Mage Mark II Task Force

name: Master of Apex's Task Force
notes: Earn the Drone Protector, Burden Bearer, and Already Dead badges

name: Master of Tin Mage's Task Force
notes: Earn the Hacker, Midnight Dodger What Dodges at Midnight, Kitty's Got Claws, and Army of Neu badges

name: Defender of Primal Earth
notes: (Issue 25) Earn both the Master of Apex and Master of Tin Mage task force badges

name: Not On My Watch
notes: Allow no Mindwashed Prisoners to escape during a Behavioral Adjustment Facility Incarnate Trial

name: Alarm Raiser
notes: Never disable a Guard Tower using the controls at its base during a Behavioral Adjustment Facility Incarnate Trial

name: Gotta Keep 'Em Separated
notes: Defeat Siege & Nightstar without moving them from their initial locations during a Behavioral Adjustment Facility Incarnate Trial

name: Strong & Pretty
notes: Defeat Siege & Nightstar while none of their reinforcements are alive during a Behavioral Adjustment Facility Incarnate Trial

name: Master of the B.A.F.
notes: Earn the Not On My Watch, Alarm Raiser, Gotta Keep 'Em Separated, and Strong and Pretty badges

name: Synchronized
notes: Destroy a Weapons Cache and a Containment Canister within 2 seconds of each other during the Lambda Sector Incarnate Trial

name: Well-Stocked
notes: Complete the Lambda Sector Incarnate Trial having destroyed all the Weapons Caches in sabotage, but using no Pacification Grenades

name: Antacid
notes: Complete the Lambda Sector Incarnate Trial having destroyed all Containment Canisters in sabotage, but using no Molecular Acids

name: Lambda Looter
notes: Complete the Lambda Sector Incarnate Trial having destroyed all containers in sabotage, but using no Pacification Grenades or Molecular Acids

name: Master of Lambda Sector
notes: Earn the Synchronized, Well-Stocked, Antacid, and Lambda Looter badges

name: Anti-Anti-Matter
notes: Complete the Keyes Island Reactor Trial after having brought Anti-Matter below 10% of his health while attempting to take control of Reactor Hope

name: Bunker Buster
notes: During the Keyes Island Reactor Trial, bust down all three doors on a bunker within three seconds, and then repeat for all bunkers near Reactor Infinity

name: Loves A Challenge
notes: Complete the Keyes Island Reactor Trial without anyone dying or destroying any terminals during the final battle with Anti-Matter

name: Avoids the Green Stuff
notes: Don't let anyone be caught by an Obliteration Beam in the final battle with Anti-Matter during the Keyes Island Reactor Trial

name: Master of Keyes Island Reactor
notes: Earn the Anti-Anti-Matter, Bunker Buster, Loves A Challenge, and Avoids the Green Stuff badges

name: Regenerate This
notes: Defeat the Self-Repairing and Lichen Infested War Walkers within 8 minutes of starting the fight

name: Tour Guide
notes: Don't let Desdemona's health go below 50% during The Underground Trial

name: Preservation Specialist
notes: Don't let any of the IDF bombs detonate in The Underground Trial

name: Avatar Assassin
notes: Defeat the Avatar of Hamidon at the same time as a Detonating Seedling in The Underground Trial

name: Master of the Underground
notes: Earn the Regenerate This, Tour Guide, Preservation Specialist, and Avatar Assassin badges

name: News Flash
notes: Complete all three 500-point Public Opinion challenges, taking no more than 8 minutes per challenge, and then finish the TPN Campus Trial

name: Fair & Balanced
notes: Do not allow a single Telepathist to convert 4 or more citizens for the duration of TPN Campus, and then finish the trial

name: Television Addict
notes: Complete all four terminals in all three buildings during each 500-point Public Opinion challenge, while also keeping H.D. above 80% health at all times, and then finish the trial

name: Tonight's Top Story
notes: Defeat Maelstrom within four minutes during each of his three encounters

name: Master of TPN Campus
notes: Earn the Spin Doctor, News Flash, Fair & Balanced, Television Addict, and Tonight's Top Story badges

name: Dreamwalker / Dreamkiller
notes: Defeat all of Malaise's possible nightmares at least once during the Minds of Mayhem Trial

name: A Perfect Storm
notes: Defeat Mother Yin while creating no more than 4 Eyes of the Storm, then complete the trial

name: Daylight Saver
notes: Defeat Mother Mayhem without allowing Aurora Borealis' health to drop below 75%, and then complete the trial

name: Lost Connection to Server
notes: Defeat Shalice Tilman without missing any opportunity to sever her connection to the Seer Network, and then complete the trial

name: Master of Minds of Mayhem
notes: Earn the Mental Voyager, Dreamwalker, A Perfect Storm, Daylight Saver, and Lost Connection to Server badges

name: The Cleanser
notes: Defeat all the Lost Worshippers in the Death from Below Sewer Trial before defeating the Lost Leader

name: Cadaver Counter
notes: Defeat the Vahzilok leader in the Death from Below Sewer Trial without killing any of the Cadavers

name: Spinebreaker
notes: Destroy all four Repulsive Spines (maintaining the protective barrier around Mot) within one minute of each other during the Dilemma Diabolique Trial

name: Sentinel Smasher
notes: Defeat the Sentinel after rescuing four specific heroes during the Dilemma Diabolique Trial

name: Sacrificial Lamb
notes: Defeat Diabolique without defeating the two heroes under her control during the final battle of the Dilemma Diabolique Trial

name: Life and Death
notes: Defeat Diabolique without allowing her to heal from a single Lifegiving Essence during the final battle of the Dilemma Diabolique Trial

name: Master of Dilemma Diabolique
notes: Earn the Spinebreaker, Sentinel Smasher, Sacrificial Lamb, and Life and Death badges

name: Brotherly Love
notes: Defeat both Neo-Shivan Obliterators within 30 seconds of each other in the Drowning in Blood trial

name: Sidereal Researcher
notes: Collect 4 meteor samples during a single run of the Drowning in Blood trial

name: Triple Threat
notes: Defeat all three Archvillains during the Battle Royale stage of the Magisterium Trial within 5 seconds of the first one's defeat

name: Ready to Rumble
notes: Defeat Black Swan sooner than 8 minutes after entering the Magisterium

name: Shadow Master
notes: Never allow Black Swan to open all six Shadow Rifts simultaneously in the Magisterium Trial

name: The Hard Way
notes: Defeat Tyrant during the final battle of the Magisterium Trial without destroying more than 12 Lights of the Well

name: Master of Magisterium
notes: Earn the Triple Threat, Ready to Rumble, Shadow Master, and The Hard Way badges

name: Bailout Hero / Bailout Villain
notes: Awarded after completing the Dream Doctor mission to complete the Dilemma Diabolique trial.
